page.title: 15LIFE STYLES-AN INTAKE CHILD
page.content: Craig Dickson is{14 years}old.He goes to various resorts for his holiday.His {parents}own a shop.He gets two pounds {pocket money}and lives in a detached house.He visits Wheatley Hall Youth Club and enjoys football.He has got a paper round and wishes to be an electrician when he gets older.He has no hobbies and doesn't like school. He can't stand the meals.In{school}he learns two languages:English & French. He has a sister.Craig buys most of his {clothes}from Fitt Bitt & Burtons.He hasn't got a favourite pop group and likes Dogtanian(TV).He{has}a dog & a Spectrum 48 computer.He lives quite near to school and doesn't like the area he lives in.He travels to school by bus.Dropping a bomb will be a great improvement on his area and he thinks Doncaster Rovers are "rubbish".Danum School's uniform is all right,he says.
